## Introduction
This project is created with the main purpose to implement several epidemiologic models and fit 
such models to information related to COVID-19. 

In particular we are interested to implement a model depen regionalized data.

The current project depends of several sources of information:

* Information generated by the University John Hopkins in the project [COVID-19](https://www.google.com).
* Information related to number of beds provided by [INEC](https://www.ecuadorencifras.gob.ec/camas-y-egresos-hospitalarios/)
